snippet: A series of inquiries into the business affairs of a prominent opposition lawmaker in Russia has led to finger pointing at governing party legislators and their obvious personal wealth.
abstract: Series of inquiries into the business affairs of Gennady V. Gudkov, a prominent opposition lawmaker in Russia, has led to return fire; his allies have begun pointing at other governing party legislators whose obvious personal wealth could not possibly be afforded on their government salaries.
lead_paragraph: A series of inquiries into the business affairs of a prominent opposition lawmaker in Russia has led to finger pointing at governing party legislators and their obvious personal wealth.

headline.seo: Russia Legislators Use Inquiries Into Wealth to Settle Scores
headline.main: In Russia, Opening Inquiries and Settling Scores
